name: Global Summit on Digital Healthcare and Future Medical Technologies
content: WYN Conferences is organizing the "Global Summit on Digital Healthcare and Future Medical Technologies", which is a platform to gather all Scientists, researchers, scholars, and all leading experts in Digital Healthcare research and marketing which is going to be held during August 25-26, 2022 in Zagreb, Croatia. The main theme of WYN Future Medicine Conference 2022 is “New Perspectives in Digital Healthcare and Future Medicine”.
